title: reg_jacobian
description: Tool to compute the Jacobian determinant map from a deformation field or control point lattice.

output_jacobian_file.title: Jacobian Determinant Map
output_jacobian_file.description: File containing the Jacobian determinant map

output_jacobian_matrix_file.title: Jacobian Matrix Map
output_jacobian_matrix_file.description: File containing the Jacobian matrix map

output_log_jacobian_file.title: Log of the Jacobian Determinant Map
output_log_jacobian_file.description: File containing the log of the Jacobian determinant map
